document.heading: Bicycle Commuter and Parking Expansion Amendment Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-365, the “Bicycle Commuter and Parking Expansion Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-1002, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and Transportation. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 7, 2010, and December 21, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 28, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 18-716 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-365 became effective on April 8, 2011.
